fields.headline: Optical technique promises terabyte disks
fields.bodyText: "A novel method of optical data storage could soon* be used to hold a terabyte of data on a disk the size of a normal DVD, say researchers at Imperial College London, UK." New Scientist has the details. * "Provided funding can be found, the team believes it should take about five years to perfect the technology and a commercial version could be available by 2010."
